medium: Silk, cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: Two four-selvedge panels, discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; two panels joined with indigo randa down center; embroidery at neck with one small pendant protruding from circle; white ground with magenta warp stripes; two small animal figures at front, back and shoulders
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
